songs.name: Bob Marley - Don't worry be Happy
songs.comments: You look sad. don't worry it's going to be alright.

songs.name: Johnny Nash - I Can See Clearly Now
songs.comments: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

songs.name: You are my Sunshine
songs.comments: Falling down is an accident; staying down is a choice.

songs.name: Coldplay - Viva La Vida
songs.comments: Keep your face always toward the sunshine--and shadows will fall behind you.

songs.name: Pharrell Williams - Happy
songs.comments: You have the whole day to look forward to.

songs.name: Justin Timberlake - CAN'T STOP THE FEELING!
songs.comments: There is so much to smile about.

songs.name: U2 - Beautiful Day
songs.comments: There is always a light at the end of the tunnel.

songs.name: Daniel Powter - Bad Day
songs.comments: Life is a roller coaster, your downs will always be followed up by your highs.

songs.name: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up
songs.comments: Your day will only get better.

songs.name: HAPPY Music - Good Morning Ukulele Music
songs.comments: Whoever is happy will make others happy.

songs.name: DJ Khaled feat. Justin Bieber, Quavo, Chance the Rapper & Lil Wayne - I'm The One
songs.comments: Be the reason someone smiles today.

songs.name: Mark Ronson - Uptown Funk (feat. Bruno Mars)
songs.comments: The less you care what others think, the happier you will be.

songs.name: Coldplay - Paradise
songs.comments: Happiness is contagious, so make sure you keep smiling.

songs.name: Daft Punk - One More Time
songs.comments: Nice smile! :)

songs.name: Boom Boom Pow
songs.comments: You rock!

songs.name: Chris Brown & Benny Benassi - Beautiful People
songs.comments: Shine bright like a diamond.

songs.name: Light Music - soft, uplifting, work, focus
songs.comments: Anger does not solve anything. It builds nothing, but it can destroy everything.

songs.name: Relaxing Piano Music: Romantic Music, Beautiful Music, Soothing Sleep Music, Relaxing Music
songs.comments: If another can easily anger you, it is because you are off balance with yourself.

songs.name: Instrumental Music for Working in Office (Easy Listening)
songs.comments: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.

songs.name: Yiruma - River Flows in You
songs.comments: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.

songs.name: Once Upon A December
songs.comments: You will not be punished for your anger, but you will be punished by your anger.

songs.name: Vanessa Carlton - A Thousand Milespy
songs.comments: Grab a kit kat. ;)

songs.name: Swedish House Mafia ft. John Martin - Don't You Worry Child
songs.comments: Anger blurs your vision and wil lead you to bad choices.

songs.name: Coldplay - A Sky Full Of Stars
songs.comments: Try this simple exercise called smiling :)

songs.name: R. Kelly - I Believe I Can Fly (LP Version)
songs.comments: Your fears are a kind of prison that confines you within a limited range of action. The less you fear, the more power you will have and the more fully you will live.

songs.name: Thinking Out Loud by Ed Sheeran
songs.comments: Courage is knowing what not to fear. - Plato

songs.name: Perfect - Ed Sheeran
songs.comments: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will. - Suzy Kassem

songs.name: One Call Away - Charlie Puth
songs.comments: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears. - Les Brown

songs.name: Coldplay - Adventure Of A Lifetime
songs.comments: Do not be afraid is written in the bible 365 times. A daily reminder from God to stay fearless.

songs.name: Katy Perry - Roar (Official
songs.comments: Your life starts when you stop being afraid.

songs.name: Black Eyed Peas - I Gotta Feeling
songs.comments: Fear does not exist anywhere except in the mind.

songs.name: Sara Bareilles - Brave
songs.comments: Fear only God.

songs.name: Miley Cyrus - The Climb
songs.comments: Overcoming your fears is the only path to achieving your goals.

songs.name: Katy Perry - Firework
songs.comments: Your life starts when you stop being afraid.

songs.name: Maroon 5 - Sugar
songs.comments: What has you so surprised?

songs.name: I'm Yours - Jason Mraz
songs.comments: Surprises are better than disappointments! - Veeraj Rane

songs.name: Gryffin, Illenium - Feel Good ft. Daya
songs.comments: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us. - Boris Pasternak

songs.name: Martin Garrix Feat.JRM - These Are The Times
songs.comments: The best things happen unexpectedly.

songs.name: Sting - Englishman In New York
songs.comments: Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often.

songs.name: Alice In Chains - Rooster
songs.comments: The secret to humor is surprise.

songs.name: Jill Scott - A Long Walk
songs.comments: Life is nothing but a succession of events full of surprises.

songs.name: Michael Jackson - Billie Jean
songs.comments: The more control you have on your life, the less chance you have of bring surprised.

songs.name: Childish Gambino - Feels Like Summer
songs.comments: Life is nothing but a succession of events full of surprises.

songs.name: Rachel Platten - Fight Song
songs.comments: Balance is key.

songs.name: Jordan Smith - Stand In The Light
songs.comments: When you can't find the sunshine, be the sunshine!

songs.name: Imagine Dragons - On Top Of The World
songs.comments: Enjoy the little things!

songs.name: Justin Bieber - Life Is Worth Living
songs.comments: A problem is a chance for you to do your best. - Duke Ellington

songs.name: Michael Jackson - Beat It
songs.comments: Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along with people.

songs.name: Nina Simone - Tell it like it is
songs.comments: Keep calm and stay positive.

songs.name: Erykah Badu - On & On
songs.comments: Calm minds bring strength and self confidence, which are both necessary for a good mental health.

songs.name: Gotye - Somebody That I Used To Know
songs.comments: Staying cool and keeping your mind calm will always pay off.

songs.name: Childish Gambino - Redbone
songs.comments: Balance is key.
